Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Great place right off the canal, close to the rail and some other cool spots including the Belgian beer project across the street. Really nicely curated beer list with some options we hadn't seen anywhere else, including some very cool ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Cool place, friendly staff, lot of beers on menu. Ordered burger which had gristly meat, never happend with burgers, maybe all their burgers are like that or i had bad luck.

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Very cosy and comfortable atmosphere with nice interior design. The shining bottles and glasses at the bar, the open windows and the view on the busy streetlife, give this pub the right kind of attractiveness for everyone interested in the true urban experience. Also great service and lovely smiles.

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Very good atmosphere to have a delicious lunch and stay to work for a couple of hours . Good music and plenty of places to seat . Food well seasoned

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: A very nice place. The food was very good but don't expect a very large selection. The coffee was great and the service fast. We had breakfast at around 10:30 on a Saturday so the place was not busy.

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: It's a very nice for meeting friends, very friendly service and atmosphere, food is a little bit pricy.

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Love it, super friendly and quick staff. The food was tasty and the prices alright. It's very cozy Inside and outside.

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Nice cafe close to the city centre of Brussels. It's perfect for a coffee or a beer with friends or to get a quick lunch. Staff is nice. They can speak English

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Great place, great food and great service. The staff are really friendly and make it a fun place to be. Will definitely go again. They allow dogs, but you can't have everything.

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Incredible place. Honestly some of the best food we had! The burrata and red pesto was to die for. Nice ambiance and staff. Great place for a beer :)

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Cool place, good beer, but the food was just ok-ish

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Super place with super Team üôå  Me and my daughter we enjoyed a lot ‚ù§.  They have cute corner for kids with a lot of toys . So can really enjoy with tasty coffee and view around ! Supeeerr !!!

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Excellent, friendly and extremely accommodating service. To say that the food is also excellent is just simply not enough. Best burgers ever, both meat and veggie. Watch out on the steps down to the bathroom, they might as well be a ladder!

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text:
We love it! Great food and very friendly staff.

One star has gone because of the absolutely bad toilet situation for disabled people.

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Like this place. The people are friendly, the wine is lovely. Well worth a visit.

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: A short walk from the centre and highly recommended by locals. Friendly, amazing staff were happy to take time to make recommendations. I liked how the menu shows some meals paired with a particular beer. This was interesting and very ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Pretty good experience here. Food was only okay and expensive. I enjoy the exterior design of the place, the interior does not carry the theme however.

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: I stopped at Walves for a quick lunch on the terrace one sunny Friday.  The Plat du Jour lunch special is a fantastic price.  Today it was a filet de Rouget with roquette and nice pieces of thin slices of parmesan cheese. They have great ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text:
I would say one of the best burgers I had
Everything is cooked in the kitchen even the fries.
If you are looking for Sunday brunch look no further
The order takes a bit of time but it‚Äôs worth it. üòã

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: I've been here twice and there was not a great deal of consistency in my experiences, the second time was rather disappointing. The service was was disappointing, and you can't pay by card which is really really inconvenient. The location is nice though and the products on offer are too. I'm not sure if I would come again though.

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Super nice food, big portions, cool atmosphere, super friendly staff And food came extremely fast

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Lovely cafe with very tasty food. This was our favourite meal we had in Belgium. Lively patio and nice staff.

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Cozy atmosphere and quality food. They offer a nice range of beers

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Our server got us a table right before close and our food came out minutes later. Everything was prepared perfectly and our server even gave us tips on where and what to check out next. We had a great time!

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Nice place to meet, food prices a bit high for what it Is, but the atmosphere is nice, very nice staff.

Name: Cafe Walvis

Name: Cafe Walvis

Name: Cafe Walvis

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Super nice vibe on the terrace with good weather. A lot of things happening around the terrace so you really feel the energy of Brussels here. The service was really good. Friendly people.

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: I like the Walvis a lot! Had the cheese burger with blue cheese and can recommend it. Lively place, lots of students, nice place to eat.

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Beer and food we're very good. Nice outdoor seating. Do come.

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: It is nice to feel like a local when you spend time here. Nice service, good food and drinks. To die for chocolate mousse.

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Nice place to sit and eat in lovely city atmosphere, highly recommended.

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text: Great atmosphere, wonderful service, good food.

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text:
Excellent place to eating! Delicious food!

Name: Cafe Walvis

Review Text: Staff are great, food is good too. Decent selection of Belgian beers!

really decent place of food for a good price.

Name: Cafe Walvis

Name: Cafe Walvis
Review Text:
Food:

Name: Cafe Walvis
